Class GuardChasingBehaviour

java.lang.Object
  prisonescape.game.model.actors.ActorAction
      prisonescape.game.model.actors.GuardChasingBehaviour

public class GuardChasingBehaviour
extends ActorAction

This class encapsulates the logic of a Guard who is chasing an Actor within the game.
